If you're up for challenging the status quo, join our team of pioneers and make your mark on the future with us. <\u002Fp>\n  <p><b>Do you dare to make an impact?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <br> \n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <br> \n  <h4 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>YOUR ROLE<\u002Fb><\u002Fh4> \n  <ul>\n   <li>As business partner contribute to overall success of Yantai AO organization by effectively managing all financial tasks. This position is required to delivery complete and accurate financial results on timely basis, drive planning, forecast, budget achievement by close collaboration with business team, on top of that this role is expected to proactively oversee the financial operations and to provide frequent in-depth financial insights and advice to site AO management team. This position should assure strict adherence to financial and internal control regulations.<br> <br> <br> <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Responsibilities<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Manager \u002F coordinate operation \u002F supply chain financial performance, position annual budget, forecast and analysis report.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Tracking KPIs and provide in-depth analysis, give suggestion to the area to be improved.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Drive business, proactively communicate stakeholder to take best informed decisions.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Provide independent &amp; implement country channel strategy to support accelerated growth in China market<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Drive strategic partnership with top channel partners &amp; enable competence growth of all channel partners<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Co-develop e-commerce strategy with marketing &amp; execute to drive incremental growth<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Drive for best-in class channel management process efficiency and governance within Henkel and B2B business in China<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Principal Accountabilities<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Define &amp; implement China differentiated &amp; integrated Channel strategy to drive for sustainable &amp; profitable growth of ACM China business in next 5 years; Including direct \u002F indirect channel mix, channel business model innovations, channel structure quantity &amp; quality review and optimization depending on business (TA \u002F Territory) on geographic level<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Enable our channel competence &amp; channel management efficiency through implementing best in class tools, processes, and channel management practices; e.g.,Channel incentive plan; Channel partner competence upskilling and training;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Channel partner lifecycle management, POS transparency enhancement &amp; data usage; pricing mechanism set up and monitoring; innovation ideation process optimization and new products launch \u002F promotion with channel partners; online &amp; offline eco-system optimization.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Support APAC Channel Excellency role to roll-out APAC channel expertise through piloting new initiatives and contribute best practices of China operations<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Position ACM as the strategic partner with DKAMs to lead the business development &amp; enhance DKAMs’ commitment and investment in joint efforts with China sales team; E.g., channel partner annual development plan definition and execution, joint market \u002F end customer development, DKAM central support system, joint marketing activities plan and execution.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Drive for Loctite EC business as the industry benchmark and ensure O2O integration in close collaboration with China sales team; e.g., define business focus of online channel to serve as the most efficient channel to reach scattered end market;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Identify key channel partners to build up the eco-system, strengthen online customer journey, define the pricing mechanism in line with our market pricing strategy; drive for more efficient leads generation and online marketing campaigns in joint collaboration with Marketing team<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Strengthen channel governance and compliance in collaboration with Legal \u002F Controlling \u002F Brand Equity &amp; Protection function;<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <h4 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>YOUR SKILLS <\u002Fb><\u002Fh4>\n  <ul>\n   <li>Bachelor degree and above<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>10-15 years relevant experience in B2B industry with strong knowledge and experiences in channel\u002Fdistributor management.<br> Consulting background will be an added advantage <br> <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Strong strategic and business analytical skills<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Broad experience &amp; insights of channel management<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Strong digital focus<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>High networking and people skills<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p>Henkel is an equal opportunity employer. <div>\n  <p>At Henkel, you can be a game changer and craft your career. Unleash your entrepreneurial spirit by bringing your ideas to life within a global team. Our leading brands and technologies, along with our high-performing businesses will provide you with countless opportunities to develop your skills and explore new paths. Your career at Henkel will contribute to a more sustainable future, while you grow within our vibrant, diverse culture of trust and belonging. If you're up for challenging the status quo, join our team of pioneers and make your mark on the future with us. <\u002Fp>\n  <p><b>Do you dare to make an impact?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <br> \n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <br> \n  <h4 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>YOUR ROLE<\u002Fb><\u002Fh4> \n  <ul>\n   <li>Independently handle demand planning process, be the owner of demand alignment meeting, improve and optimize demand planning process continuously.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Collaborate with Sales, Marketing and Controlling to deliver a realistic and unbiased rolling forecast based on assumptions\u002Fanalysis across planning horizon for relecant products and customers.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Strong data analysis skills and analytical thinking is required. Provide clear analysis to cross function to achieve alignment in forecast process.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Review the top bias (sales performance vs forecast) in order to take actions, adjust the demand and statistical model improvement where it is necessary. Drive improvement in forecast accuracy and bias.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Co-ordinate cross-functional research activities to reconcile significant \u002F foreseeing variances and refine the forecast (model and demand) to reflect updated Sales and Marketing assumptions<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Using APO DP\u002FSNP tools to co-ordinate rolling 18 months demand vs supply. Close demand-supply gap by collaborating with SP.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Close communicate with local and global supply planning team, to ensure right production arrangement (quantity and deliver timing);Communicate priorities and expedite delivery when plan indicates shortages will occur.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>FG inventory management: Inventory as % Sales, safety stock, OOS &amp; daily production scheduling review, stock allocation for key customers, stock allocation between CDC &amp; RDCs, stock aging and over-stock analysis.Ensure low inventory and high service level on local variants of the standard product range<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Weekly \u002F monthly reports and S&amp;OP continuous improvement.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Manually adjust allocations where necessary to support business development.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Project\u002FSystem Implementation, including Demand Sensing, Safety stock parameters and etc.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Planning team overall reports including FCA, M0 sales, Stock sufficiency, Y status, etc.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Potentioal to grow:<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>S&amp;OP process monitor and continuous improvement. Act as S&amp;OP meeting facilitator, collaborate with Sale D, MKT D and Controlling to deliver monthly S&amp;OP process to delivery key decision making.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Leadership in overall demand planning process, personal development and potential for team leader.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Principal Accountabilities<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Demand Alignment Process 40%<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Communicating Forecast to Multi-Functional team 20%<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Forecast Accuracy Continuous Improvement 20%<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Sales and Operations Planning Process 10%<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Supply tracking 10%<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <h4 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>YOUR SKILLS <\u002Fb><\u002Fh4>\n  <ul>\n   <li>Bachelor's degree<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Business, Logistics, Supply Chain, and Engineering Major<\u002Fli> \n   <li>3-5 years Working Year<\u002Fli> \n   <li>FMCG Industry<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Excellent English<\u002Fli> \n   <li>SAP APO, Microsoft PowerBI, Excel<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p>Henkel is an equal opportunity employer. Standards<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Provides regulatory inputs during the artwork review process to ensure correctness of labeling<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Support innovation project on regulatory Maintenance for Existing Registration (50%)<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Study registration feasibility to support marketing plans (5%)<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Organize all the required documents in cooperation with IRD, Asia PD and 3rd party institutes for HCB portfolio in Great China market (20%)<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Manage document packages for Regulatory submissions and application for product registration \u002F amendment \u002F extension (25%)<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Assuring compliance of products with existing legislations under CFDA, EPA etc. (50%)<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Keep If you're up for challenging the status quo, join our team of pioneers and make your mark on the future with us. <\u002Fp>\n  <p><b>Do you dare to make an impact?<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n  <br> \n  <p><\u002Fp>\n  <br> \n  <h4 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>YOUR ROLE <\u002Fb><\u002Fh4>\n  <ul>\n   <li>Job Purpose<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Manage the import and export business in Yantai site, and ensure all businesses in import &amp; export department are operated efficiently and in compliance. Maintain all paper and electronic data\u002Fdocumentations completed and integrated. Collect ,tidy up, supplement and maintain all AEO project related materials and operations based on the latest AEO criterion issued by China customs, collaborate with relevant departments to make sure every AEO reaudit conducted by China customs goes smoothly and successfully. Carry out daily work in accordance with SHEQ management systems standards and other relevant procedures requirements.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Key Dimensions<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>2021: Import: 1,734 shipments, amount: 32,720 TUSD;<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Export: 4,286 shipments, amount: 40,395 TUSD<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Principal Accountabilities<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Manage the Customs operations for all related import\u002Fexport activities of Yantai site to ensure compliance and smooth business operations. Work closely with customs, the commercial inspection agencies and forwarders for import\u002Fexport materials and goods to make sure all business operations are always complying with national and local laws, regulations and all activities are well documented with accuracy. Meanwhile make sure the company has the most updated information about import\u002Fexport regulations, policy, and the company interests are well protected. 50%<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Double check import and export declaration sheet for each shipment to make sure Customs data is correct. 20%<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Collect ,tidy up, supplement and maintain all AEO project related materials and operations based on the latest AEO criterion issued by China customs, and collaborate with relevant departments to make sure every AEO reaudit conducted by China customs goes smoothly and successfully. 10%<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Check the bills from all forwarders carefully to ensure that all the freight and other related expenses to be paid by the company are correct. Especially the expenses related to Customs affairs. 10%<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Collaborate with regional Trade &amp; Tax department to make sure the tariff related Royalty to be paid in time and the HS code classification for im.&amp; ex. materials reasonable and compliant 5%<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Other works related to imports and exports 5%<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <h4 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>YOUR SKILLS <\u002Fb><\u002Fh4>\n  <ul>\n   <li>Bachelor Degree<\u002Fli> \n   <li>International Trade Major<\u002Fli> \n   <li>3-5 years Working Year<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Good English<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p>Henkel is an equal opportunity employer. He\u002FShe will be responsible for the performance improvement and productivity of the planning organization. The role has no direct reports but indirect reports throughout Asia. The role will be responsible for supporting and leading the strategic, tactical and operational performance efforts for planning and the supply chain through organizational design and implementation as well as utilization of world class planning tools and processes (i.e. S&amp;OP, DS, Assortment).<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li><b>Job purpose <\u002Fb><br> <\u002Fli>\n   <li>The successful candidate will support Henkel’s Planning and overall Supply Chain performance improvement by implementing advanced planning tools, strategies and new supply chain management processes that will improve overall customer service levels.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li><b>Key Interfaces<\u002Fb><br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li><b>I<\u002Fb><b>nternal:<\u002Fb><br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Supply Chain and Planning teams in the <li>Regional Operations <br> <\u002Fli>\n   <li>Regional Sales<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Global SC<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>HR<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li><b>External:<\u002Fb><br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Suppliers<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Customers<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Distributors<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <h4 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>YOUR SKILLS <\u002Fb><\u002Fh4>\n  <ul>\n   <li><b>Role Requirements<\u002Fb><\u002Fli> \n   <li><b>Hard skills:<\u002Fb><\u002Fli> \n   <li>The manager will provide subject matter expertise for planning and supported supply chain functions;<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>The manager will have direct experience in planning roles and specifically in demand planning<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>The candidate will have strong knowledge of S&amp;OP, APO, assortment and other advanced supply chain management strategies and planning tools;<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>The candidate will have a strong track record of operational excellence and continuous improvement in end to end planning \u002F supply chain with measurable results;<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>The manager will have had planning organizational leadership complexity that ideally includes multi-country responsibility;<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>The leader will have operated in the consumer industry with demonstrated engagement in downstream distributor and retail channels.<\u002Fli> \n   <li><b>Soft skills:<\u002Fb><\u002Fli> \n   <li>The candidate should possess influence, strong communication skills, executive presence and a hands on improvement style to be successful in this role; <br> <\u002Fli>\n   <li>The candidate should have management experience in leading and developing planning professionals;<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>The candidate will have a deep understanding of advanced planning tactics and strategies;<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>The candidate will have experienced and led organizational transformations and possess the courage needed to drive organizational change.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li><b>Key Performance Objectives<\u002Fb><\u002Fli> \n   <li>Key objectives of the role will include: the following actions with the responsibility to develop the procedure and talent based to execute the resultant changes.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Build and lead a Henkel Asia planning community<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Design and build regional Control Towers where beneficial (decentral vs. center led)<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Drive a demand led SC via utilization of existing (APO, DS) and future planning tools<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Implement inventory assortment management<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li><b>Key Performance Indicators<\u002Fb><\u002Fli> \n   <li>Delivery, Organizational Productivity, Inventory Turns, Forecast Accuracy, Cash Flow, EBIT<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li><b>Candidate Acumens<\u002Fb><\u002Fli> \n   <li>The successful candidate should possess the competencies and personal attributes, which include but are not limited to the following:<\u002Fli> \n   <li><b>Business Acumen<\u002Fb><\u002Fli> \n   <li>S\u002Fhe will possess the business acumen to be a sound business partner in the organization by influencing and advising partners on the supply chain influences to business results.<\u002Fli> \n   <li>S\u002Fhe will be able to bring a high level of strategic thinking and focus to the organization, driving a clear agenda to achieve the company’s goals;<\u002Fli> \n   <li>S\u002FHe has the ability to drive performance and strategy.<\u002Fli> \n   <li><b>Executing for \n   <li>S\u002Fhe will have the know-how to convert strategies into actions with defined goals. Clearly a track record of success combining strategies and tactics will be core to the role;<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>S\u002Fhe has the ability to leverage and create value driven processes to drive efficiency and process while not losing the effectiveness of pace, drive and innovation;<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>S\u002Fhe is capable and driven to be hands-on and engaged in the operation to drive results;<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>S\u002Fhe has a strong track-record of success coupled with a strong customer and partner focus approach to meet client expectations.<\u002Fli> \n   <li><b>Building Relationships and Using Influence<\u002Fb><\u002Fli> \n   <li>S\u002Fhe will communicate with empathy across a broad range of internal stakeholders, partners and external audiences;<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>S\u002Fhe has excellent communication and management skills, proven inside and outside Asia;<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>S\u002Fhe can quickly earn credibility with peers and partners (internal &amp; external);<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>S\u002Fhe will motivate others, through influence and direction and brings the right level of sensitivity and strength to navigate the Henkel network;<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>S\u002FHe has worked in a multi-national organization with significant interface with external partners (JV, Clients and\u002For suppliers).<\u002Fli> \n   <li><b>Leadership<\u002Fb><\u002Fli> \n   <li>S\u002Fhe will be able to co-build a strong team throughout Asia, motivated to achieve the long and short-term goals. Specifically, this role will focus on working on business problems coming from regional teams.<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Impacted NES per month: 200M EUR, Total Supply Chain Cost per month 20M EUR<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Principal Accountabilities<br> <\u002Fli> \n   <li>Data Architecture:<br> \n    <ul>\n     <li>Design the common data architecture including framework, principle, guideline and template to guide the team realize an optimized solution.<\u002Fli>\n     <li>Design and implement the detailed data architecture includes data governance, master data strategy, master data management, data quality, data modeling, data naming conventions, data storage 35%<\u002Fli>\n    <\u002Ful><\u002Fli> \n   <li>Data management:<br> \n    <ul>\n     <li>Design and develop Database, Data Warehouse or Data Lake according to business needs. <\u002Fli>\n     <li>Implement BI solutions on Data warehouse or Data Lake. 30%<\u002Fli>\n    <\u002Ful><\u002Fli> \n   <li>Requirement Management:<br> \n    <ul>\n     <li>Understand and work with multiple data sources to meet business rules and supports analytical needs.<\u002Fli>\n     <li>Identify the gap between business requirement and data architecture and propose solution to resolve or shorten the gap. 25%<\u002Fli>\n    <\u002Ful><\u002Fli> \n   <li>Technology innovation: Identifies industry trends, market &amp; customer needs in the field of digitalization relevant for supply chain in APAC and translates them into specific offerings, business opportunities and projects. Introduce new digital technologies to supply chain and apply the best-fit to digital applications. 10%<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n <div><\u002Fdiv>\n <div>\n  <h4 class=\"jobSectionHeader\"><b>YOUR SKILLS <\u002Fb><\u002Fh4>\n  <ul>\n   <li>Master's degree<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Business Management, supply Chain, Computer Science, Engeering Major<\u002Fli> \n   <li>5-10 years Working Year<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Fluent English<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Professional Excel and PPT skills<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n  <p>Henkel is an equal opportunity employer. This role is also the key interface to the Operations and Purchasing organizations for strategic technology related initiatives enabling growth ambitions with the right capacity, capability, and supply strategy.<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n  <ul>\n   <li>Tasks of the position:<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Defines and executes the product and technology strategy globally within the given portfolio responsibility<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Identifies long and short term product and technology opportunities and develops technology roadmaps aligned with market needs<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Establishes product and technology assessments<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Aggregate and validate business cases for SBU driven Operations investments and MFOs<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Aligns ADP projects with required technology capacity and capability<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Lead strategic adaptation of technology portfolio to changing market conditions<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Provides input to Manufacturing and Purchasing on manufacturing footprint considerations and long-term supply chain needs globally<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Manages and optimizes product profitability and COGs projects on a global level in alignment with roll-out of new technologies<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Act as representative on, and sometimes lead, cross-SBU and cross-Adhesive Technologies related initiatives, projects and programs (e.g. Technology Road mapping and Steering, etc)<\u002Fli> \n   <li>Coordinates key programs that are new to Henkel but have the ability to generate significant revenue<\u002Fli> \n  <\u002Ful>\n <\u002Fdiv>\n
